response.original_title: La vie en rose comme dans les films
response.overview: I came across a collection of Super 8mm reels in a thrift store. The reels are over 40 years old and belong a family I do not know of. It seems like a perfect family. I set out to return the films back to their owner. The reality hidden behind the beautiful footage slowly reveals itself.
response.tagline: Life in pink like in the movies
response.title: La vie en rose comme dans les films
